data.message: Implemented path-finding feature for InterSphere knowledge graph: Successfully built: PathFinderPanel component, path highlighting with gold glow/step numbers, GraphControls Find Path button, convertPathToGraph utility. Build passed, deployed to Vercel. However, discovered the backend BFS algorithm is slow (15.5s) and often fails to find obvious paths.
data.task: Implemented path-finding feature for InterSphere knowledge graph
data.outcome: Successfully built: PathFinderPanel component, path highlighting with gold glow/step numbers, GraphControls Find Path button, convertPathToGraph utility. Build passed, deployed to Vercel. However, discovered the backend BFS algorithm is slow (15.5s) and often fails to find obvious paths.
